mean_en: used when adding something to support an idea or argument; despite something; even so; used when changing the subject of a conversation, ending the conversation or returning to a subject; used to correct or slightly change what you have said
sentence: It doesn't matter; they all go to the same place anyway.
sentence_trans: 没关系，所有路无论如何都通向一个地方。
word_etyma: any无论 + way方式 → anyway无论如何
